profile.name: Nicolas Gallagher
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Meta | Exploring React Native and styleQ
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for building scalable, maintainable applications. Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, and various frameworks. Always looking to learn and contribute to open-source projects.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Meta
description: Contributed to the development of Facebook JS utility libraries and React Native applications.
Exploring styleQ and its potential for improving web performance.

experience.title: Freelance Developer (2018-2023)
description: Worked on various projects, including React, Globalize, and Facebook JS utility libraries.
Maintained open-source repositories for lexical and normalize.css.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer (2016-2018)
description: Contributed to the development of React, Globalize, and Facebook JS utility libraries.
Participated in various open-source projects and communities.
